channel.title: Parkour Legends ! 317 24/7 Client ! Hamacia open alot os staffes!
channel.description:
---------------------------------- Credits for client 20% to me for adding and editing 50% to edge pkz for base 30% to my friends for some but most of the models ------------------------------ Commands: commands for player (type on game ::commands)
Mod commands: ::mute (username) ::unmute (username) ::banplayer (username) ::unban (username) ::kick (username) ::teleto (username) ::teletome (username)
Admin/Owner commands: (all of above +) ::mute (username) ::unmute (username) ::banplayer (username) ::unban (username) ::kick (username) ::teleto (username) ::teletome (username) ::kill (username) ::npc (NPC ID) Example: ::npc 999 1 ::givemod (username) NOTE: Owner and Co-Owner only. ::giveadmin (username) NOTE: Owner and Co-Owner only. ::demote (username) Note: Owner and Co-Owner only. ::checkip (username) NOTE: Thats ipban. But only the server owner can do. ::ipbanuser ::npcreset -- reset npc's
[u]Staff List[/u]
Owner !!: Mod darker
Co-owner: Noob
Head admin : (open)
Admin : (open) (open) (open) (open)
Mods: (open) (open) (open) (open) (open)
Feature/Pictures Dragon claws with special attack Dark Bow with special attack PvP amour Vesta long sword special attack Status hammer Special attack Loadz of custum interfaces Cleaned out client Dueling removed - Fixes loadz of dupes Stable base Stable mining base
Note :: [size=10pt] u have to download (logmein hamacia) becuse the port forwading dosent works on my computer ,,, before download u must register at :* and log on server (hamacia) *
setp 1 : download hamacia setp 2 :click creat net work (any 1 u need ) setp 3 : click network click join an existing network and then write:: *
and then the password is : *
AFTER RUNNING THE CLIENT CHANGE THE IP SERVER TO : * U MUST DO THAT !!!!!!!!!! [/size] Client download - * Client download - * Client download - *
I hope u enjoy !! comment plz

item.title: Parkour Legends ! 317 24/7 Client ! Hamacia open alot os staffes!
item.dc:creator: @raze9999 raze9999
item.description:
@raze9999 wrote:

Credits for client
20% to me for adding and editing
50% to edge pkz for base
30% to my friends for some but most of the models

Commands: commands for player (type on game ::commands)

Mod commands:
::mute (username)
::unmute (username)
::banplayer (username)
::unban (username)
::kick (username)
::teleto (username)
::teletome (username)

Admin/Owner commands:
(all of above +)
::mute (username)
::unmute (username)
::banplayer (username)
::unban (username)
::kick (username)
::teleto (username)
::teletome (username)
::kill (username)
::npc (NPC ID) Example: ::npc 999 1
::givemod (username) NOTE: Owner and Co-Owner only.
::giveadmin (username) NOTE: Owner and Co-Owner only.
::demote (username) Note: Owner and Co-Owner only.
::checkip (username) NOTE: Thats ipban. But only the server owner can do.
::ipbanuser
::npcreset – reset npc’s

Staff List

Owner !!:
Mod darker

Co-owner:
Noob

Head admin :
(open)

Admin :
(open)
(open)
(open)
(open)

Mods:
(open)
(open)
(open)
(open)
(open)

Feature/Pictures
Dragon claws with special attack
Dark Bow with special attack
PvP amour
Vesta long sword special attack
Status hammer Special attack
Loadz of custum interfaces
Cleaned out client
Dueling removed - Fixes loadz of dupes
Stable base
Stable mining base

Note ::
[size=10pt]
u have to download (logmein hamacia) becuse the port forwading dosent works on my computer ,
before download u must register at :*
and log on server (hamacia) *

setp 1 : download hamacia
setp 2 :click creat net work (any 1 u need )
setp 3 : click network click join an existing network and then write::
*

and then the password is : *

AFTER RUNNING THE CLIENT CHANGE THE IP SERVER TO : *
U MUST DO THAT !!!
[/size]
Client download - *
Client download - *
Client download - *

I hope u enjoy !! comment plz
